message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the sale of this product with you. I think it's a great opportunity for both of us to make a deal. I'm willing to offer you the product for $12,000. This is a competitive price considering its value to you, and I believe it's a fair starting point for our negotiation.

Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the effort you've put into making this deal. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $9,500 for the product. I believe this price reflects its true value to me while remaining within my budget.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I understand that you're looking to stay within your budget, but I still need to ensure I get a fair price for the product. I'm willing to compromise and offer you the product for $11,000. This is a reasonable price considering its value to you, and I believe it's a good middle ground for both of us.

I appreciate your willingness to compromise, Alice. Considering the value of the product to me, I would like to propose a counteroffer of $10,500. I hope this aligns better with your expectations while staying within my budget.

Thank you for your latest offer, Bob. I understand that you're trying to find a sweet spot, but I still need to get closer to my target price. I'm willing to make another concession and offer you the product for $11,500. This is the best I can do, considering the value of the product to you and my own expectations.

I appreciate your continued efforts to reach an agreement, Alice. Based on my assessment of the product's value, I would like to propose a counteroffer of $11,000. This price seems to be a fair compromise between our respective positions.

I understand that we're getting close to a deal, Bob. However, I still need to get a bit closer to my target price. I'm willing to make another concession and offer you the product for $11,800. This is the best I can do, considering the value of the product to you and my own expectations.

I appreciate your efforts, Alice. Considering the product's value to me, I would like to propose a counteroffer of $11,500. I hope this aligns better with your expectations while staying within my budget.

I'm getting close to accepting your offer, Bob, but I still need to get a bit closer to my target price. I'm willing to make another concession and offer you the product for $12,000. This is the best I can do, considering the value of the product to you and my own expectations.

I appreciate your continued efforts, Alice. Considering the product's value to me, I would like to propose a final counteroffer of $11,600. I hope this aligns better with your expectations while staying within my budget.
